nodes.text: Gription boots were worn by the Galactic Empire's range troopers assigned to the 20-T Railcrawler conveyex transport on the planet Vandor. The heavy-duty gription boots were magnetized, allowing Vandor's range troopers on security duty to inspect the conveyex whilst the transport was in motion. The boots were linked to an interface control, which was typically located on a trooper's vambrace armor plate.
